title: Don Zimmer, Baseball's Own 'Popeye,' Passes At The Age Of 83
teaser: As first a player and then a coach, Don Zimmer spent more than six decades in baseball. The legendary manager, nicknamed "Popeye," has died at the age of 83. Richard Justice of MLB.com discusses the man's legacy.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
